# collapseItems(_:)

**Instance Method**

Collapses the specified items in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
func collapseItems(_ items: [Any])
```

## Expanding and collapsing items

- **isExpanded(_:)**: Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.
- **expandItems(_:)**: Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.

items.description: Indicates whether the item with the specified identifier is in an expanded state.
items.name: isExpanded(_:)

items.description: Expands the specified items in the section snapshot.
items.name: expandItems(_:)
